amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that states may use funds awarded as Quality Pathways Grants under Section 403(a) of Title IV of H.R. 3221 to establish or support partnerships with institutions of higher education that support effective education and training for early learning providers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-256 to clarify that states may use funds awarded as Quality Pathways Grants under Section 403(a) of Title IV of H.R. 3221 to establish or support partnerships with institutions of higher education that support effective education and training for early learning providers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
